summary: Repairs the broken not completly scalling enchantment you can learn by disenchant Magerobes.
descriptionHtml:
Repairs the broken not completly scalling enchantment you can learn by disenchant Magerobes.
tested via console:
player.getactorvalue magickaratemult
player.getactorvalue destructionmod
gives back corect values!
knownbugs:
Discription of the effect is still broken, but only the discription, so donÂ´t worry.
not working together with the perk coorpusenchanter.
author: ubuntufreakdragon
